segments.name: Opening Shot
segments.text: In modern manufacturing, visibility is everything. Meet Sarah, Plant Manager at Apex Manufacturing.

segments.name: Real-Time OEE Metrics
segments.text: Sarah's day starts with complete visibility. The OEE dashboard shows her exactly how the plant performed overnight.

segments.name: Equipment Status at a Glance
segments.text: She notices CNC-03 has lower performance than usual.

segments.name: Active Work Orders
segments.text: The dashboard shows all active work orders with real-time status updates.

segments.name: Global Search & Quick Actions
segments.text: Need specific information? The global search finds anything instantly.

segments.name: Closing
segments.text: Complete visibility. Instant insights. Data-driven decisions. That's modern manufacturing.

segments.name: The Challenge
segments.text: Meet Mike and Jennifer, manufacturing engineers tasked with reducing cycle time for Widget A by 15%.

segments.name: Gantt Chart Analysis
segments.text: The Gantt chart view visualizes the entire process, making bottlenecks obvious.

segments.name: Real-Time Collaboration
segments.text: Jennifer joins the routing. The system shows Mike she's here, preventing conflicting changes.

segments.name: Making Changes
segments.text: They reconfigure the routing together, with all changes automatically tracked.

segments.name: Review and Activation
segments.text: Before activating, they review all changes and run a validation check.

segments.name: Impact & Closing
segments.text: The new routing is instantly available to operators, and work orders automatically update.

segments.name: Clocking In
segments.text: Tom arrives at Assembly Station 3 and starts his shift. No more paper travelers or clipboards.

segments.name: Selecting Work Order
segments.text: The system shows Tom exactly what needs to be done, prioritized by due date.

segments.name: Step-by-Step Instructions
segments.text: Digital work instructions guide Tom through each step with photos, videos, and automated data collection.

segments.name: Quality Checkpoints
segments.text: Built-in quality checkpoints prevent defects from moving forward.

segments.name: Completion
segments.text: When Tom finishes, the system updates inventory, notifies the next operation, and creates a complete quality record.

segments.name: Closing
segments.text: No paperwork. No data entry errors. Complete traceability. That's the future of manufacturing.

segments.name: The Alert
segments.text: A customer reports a bearing failure in Widget A. Quality Engineer Linda needs to find the root causeâ€”fast.

segments.name: Genealogy Tree Visualization
segments.text: The genealogy tree shows the complete history of this product and every material that went into it.

segments.name: Identifying the Pattern
segments.text: Linda searches for other products using bearings from the same lot.

segments.name: Root Cause Analysis
segments.text: Drilling deeper, Linda discovers the assembly process used higher-than-spec torque for position 1.

segments.name: Containment & Corrective Action
segments.text: With the root cause identified, Linda immediately takes action.

segments.name: Closing
segments.text: Five minutes. Complete root cause analysis. Proactive containment. That's the power of digital traceability.

segments.name: Initiating FAI
segments.text: A new aerospace part requires First Article Inspection. Quality Engineer Rachel starts the digital FAI process.

segments.name: Automated Balloon Drawing
segments.text: The system automatically balloons the drawing, identifying every feature that requires measurement.

segments.name: Measurement Data Collection
segments.text: Rachel performs measurements, and the system validates against specifications in real-time.

segments.name: Non-Conformance Handling
segments.text: When a non-conformance is detected, the system ensures proper documentation and approval.

segments.name: Final Package Generation
segments.text: With all measurements complete and deviations documented, the system generates the full AS9102 package automatically.

segments.name: Closing
segments.text: Complete AS9102 compliance in a fraction of the time. Automated documentation. Zero errors.

segments.name: Shift Startup
segments.text: 7 AM. Carlos starts his shift by reviewing the team work queue and production targets.

segments.name: Work Allocation
segments.text: Carlos assigns work orders to his team based on skills, equipment availability, and priorities.

segments.name: Real-Time Monitoring
segments.text: Throughout the shift, Carlos monitors progress in real-time, seeing exactly what's happening on the floor.

segments.name: Issue Resolution
segments.text: Carlos responds immediately, minimizing downtime and keeping production on track.

segments.name: Performance Review
segments.text: At shift end, Carlos reviews team performance and hands off seamlessly to the next shift.

segments.name: Shift Handoff
segments.text: The night shift supervisor gets complete visibility, ensuring continuity.

segments.name: The Ecosystem Overview
segments.text: Modern manufacturing isn't about isolated systems. It's about seamless integration. Watch how this MES connects everything.

segments.name: ERP Integration: Order to Production
segments.text: When a sales order is entered in the ERP, the MES automatically creates production schedules and work orders.

segments.name: B2M Integration: Machine Connectivity
segments.text: The MES communicates directly with production equipment through B2M protocol, collecting data in real-time.

segments.name: Automated Quality Integration
segments.text: Measurement data from CMMs, calipers, and test equipment flows directly into quality records.

segments.name: Analytics & Business Intelligence
segments.text: All MES data flows to analytics platforms, turning production data into business insights.

segments.name: Warehouse & Logistics Integration
segments.text: When production completes, the MES updates the warehouse system and triggers shipping.

segments.name: Closing: The Connected Factory
segments.text: From order to shipment, every system connected. Every process optimized. That's smart manufacturing.
